players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and found out he's one of them."
You: "Charlie's alibi doesn't seem convincing, and Diana's investigation suggests he might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "I have an alibi for the night of Bob's death. I was at the barn, tending to the animals. I believe Alice and Diana are jumping to conclusions based on limited information."
Diana: "Charlie's alibi doesn't seem convincing, and I think we should investigate the barn to confirm his story."
You: "Bob was found dead, and Diana investigated Charlie. We should investigate the barn to confirm his alibi."
